get.description: Retrieves the data model and reload statistics meta data of an app.

parameters.name: docId
parameters.description:
Identifier of the app.
One of:
* Path and name of the app (Qlik Sense Desktop)
* GUID (Qlik Sense Enterprise)
* Relativ path and name of the app (Qlik Core)

reload_meta.description: Meta data for the last app reload.

static_byte_size.description: Static memory usage for the app.

cpu_time_spent_ms.description: Number of CPU milliseconds it took to reload the app.

hardware.description: Hardware available for the engine doing the reload.

is_system.description:
If set to true, it means that the field is a system field.
The default value is false.

is_hidden.description:
If set to true, it means that the field is hidden.
The default value is false.

is_semantic.description:
If set to true, it means that the field is a semantic.
The default value is false.

distinct_only.description:
If set to true, only distinct field values are shown.
The default value is false.

is_locked.description:
If set to true, it means that the field is locked.
The default value is false.

always_one_selected.description:
If set to true, it means that the field has one and only one selection (not 0 and not more than 1).
If this property is set to true, the field cannot be cleared anymore and no more selections can be performed in that field.
The default value is false.

is_numeric.description:
Is set to true if the value is a numeric.
The default value is false.

tags.description:
Gives information on a field. For example, it can return the type of the field.
Examples: key, text, ASCII.

byte_size.description: Static RAM memory used in bytes.

is_system.description:
If set to true, it means that the table is a system table.
The default value is false.

is_semantic.description:
If set to true, it means that the table is a semantic.
The default value is false.

is_loose.description:
If set to true, it means that the table is loose due to circular connection.
The default value is false.

byte_size.description: Static RAM memory used in bytes.
